hero.cta: First, I solve the problem. Then, I write the code.

aboutMe.title: Rendering My Story
aboutMe.paragraph1: I am a Full Stack developer with a focus on Frontend. I like to build clean and clear interfaces that look good and work well. I enjoy solving problems and finding the simplest way to bring an idea to life.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I work with a stack centered on JavaScript and TypeScript, along with frameworks such as React, Next.js, and Node.js. I also have experience with modern databases, and I tend to incorporate new technologies depending on the project's needs or to continue growing professionally.
aboutMe.paragraph3: Creating a web page is like building a universe: you start from nothing, and line by line you create something that others can experience.
